body_html:
Hi there, I think you've tagged the wrong person. Maybe you meant @chsasank?
…
On Fri, Dec 22, 2017 at 6:16 AM, YinTaiChen ***@***.***> wrote: It's an issue about translating PyTorch tutorial into Traditional Chinese. Mr. @soumith <https://github.com/soumith>: It was a nice talk with you during the lunch today at GAN workshop, Taiwan. I was very happy to get your permission to translate PyTorch tutorial <http://pytorch.org/tutorials/>. Here is an example <https://github.com/YinTaiChen/Understanding-PyTorch-in-Depth/blob/master/What%20is%20Pytorch.ipynb>, which is translated from this page <http://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/blitz/tensor_tutorial.html>. I raised this issue because I had contacted @sasank <https://github.com/sasank> before met you personally, and he suggested me to do so. He also mentioned that we need to figure how to host/publish the Chinese translation. Cheers! — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#4315>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAKUhpvIPx6l5BIaVNZBXvTc5UlHmArwks5tC7mogaJpZM4RLFNT> .

Hi there, I think you've tagged the wrong person. Maybe you meant @chsasank?
…
On Fri, Dec 22, 2017 at 6:16 AM, YinTaiChen ***@***.***> wrote:
 It's an issue about translating PyTorch tutorial into Traditional Chinese.

 Mr. @soumith <https://github.com/soumith>:

 It was a nice talk with you during the lunch today at GAN workshop, Taiwan.

 I was very happy to get your permission to translate PyTorch tutorial
 <http://pytorch.org/tutorials/>.

 Here is an example
 <https://github.com/YinTaiChen/Understanding-PyTorch-in-Depth/blob/master/What%20is%20Pytorch.ipynb>,
 which is translated from this page
 <http://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/blitz/tensor_tutorial.html>.

 I raised this issue because I had contacted @sasank
 <https://github.com/sasank> before met you personally, and he suggested
 me to do so. He also mentioned that we need to figure how to host/publish
 the Chinese translation.

 Cheers!

 —
 You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
 Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
 <#4315>, or mute the thread
 <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAKUhpvIPx6l5BIaVNZBXvTc5UlHmArwks5tC7mogaJpZM4RLFNT>
 .
body:
Hi there, I think you've tagged the wrong person. Maybe you meant @chsasank?

On Fri, Dec 22, 2017 at 6:16 AM, YinTaiChen <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> It's an issue about translating PyTorch tutorial into Traditional Chinese.
>
> Mr. @soumith <https://github.com/soumith>:
>
> It was a nice talk with you during the lunch today at GAN workshop, Taiwan.
>
> I was very happy to get your permission to translate PyTorch tutorial
> <http://pytorch.org/tutorials/>.
>
> Here is an example
> <https://github.com/YinTaiChen/Understanding-PyTorch-in-Depth/blob/master/What%20is%20Pytorch.ipynb>,
> which is translated from this page
> <http://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/blitz/tensor_tutorial.html>.
>
> I raised this issue because I had contacted @sasank
> <https://github.com/sasank> before met you personally, and he suggested
> me to do so. He also mentioned that we need to figure how to host/publish
> the Chinese translation.
>
> Cheers!
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/4315>, or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAKUhpvIPx6l5BIaVNZBXvTc5UlHmArwks5tC7mogaJpZM4RLFNT>
> .
>
